dimensions:
Warp: 106 cm [41 3/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
Weft: 76.5 cm [30"]  Selvedge to selvedge.
title: Woven portrait
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 4 & 1 satin with discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in plain weave by a supplementary warp
description: A woven portrait of the Comtesse de Provence is embroidered to the fabric that forms the frame.  The frame is a wreath of multicolor flowers with a bow at the top.
name: Woven portrait
